meta.label: GitHub Pull Requests
meta.description: Allows to list all opened Pull Request on the specified repositories

params.name: personal_access_token_credentials
params.label: Github Personal Access Token
params.description: For more info on how to create your token: https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token

params.name: repositories
params.label: Git repositories
params.description: List of Git repositories to fetch Pull Requests from
